title: Streamlines Excel File Automation
text: goal excelsior provide tools automating data entry involves transfering data one excel file another.

title: Streamlines Excel File Automation
text: can install development version excelsior GitHub :

what: Convert character vector to numeric with intelligent handling — as_numeric_smart
title: Convert character vector to numeric with intelligent handling — as_numeric_smart
text: Converts character vector numeric intelligently handling common formatting appears reading mixed numeric character cells excel, like commas percentages.

title: Convert character vector to numeric with intelligent handling — as_numeric_smart
Convert character vector to numeric with intelligent handling — as_numeric_smart
Convert character vector to numeric with intelligent handling — as_numeric_smart
text: numeric vector following transformations applied: Commas removed (e.g., "1,000" becomes 1000) Percentages removed numbers converted proportions (e.g., "10%" becomes 0.1) Values converted return NA

title: Convert character vector to numeric with intelligent handling — as_numeric_smart

what: Copy columns from one Excel file to another with change tracking — copy_columns
title: Copy columns from one Excel file to another with change tracking — copy_columns
text: Copies specified columns input Excel file workbook, highlighting changes compared master file adding metadata transfer. row_start row_end easily identified using row_finder().

title: Copy columns from one Excel file to another with change tracking — copy_columns
code: copy_columns(   wb,   master_file,   in_file,   sheet,   columns,   row_start,   row_end,   color_scheme,   meta_cell,   verbose = TRUE )

title: Copy columns from one Excel file to another with change tracking — copy_columns
text: wb openxlsx2 workbook object modify master_file Character. Filepath "original" reference file in_file Character. Filepath containing workbook data copy sheet Character. Sheet name copy /columns Character vector. Excel column letters copy (e.g., c("", "B")) row_start Integer. Initial row number copy row_end Integer. Final row number copy color_scheme Character vector length 2. Hex colors "Changed" "Unchanged" cells. Use general color different shades. meta_cell Character. Excel cell reference add transfer metadata (color, file, date). verbose Logical. Whether print progress messages. Defaults TRUE.

title: Copy columns from one Excel file to another with change tracking — copy_columns
text: Modified workbook object copied data, change highlighting, metadata

what: excelsior: Streamlines Excel File Automation — excelsior-package
title: excelsior: Streamlines Excel File Automation — excelsior-package
text: Useful tools automation excel file data entry, especially transfering parts one sheet sheet another file.

title: excelsior: Streamlines Excel File Automation — excelsior-package

what: Find row number based on an
title: Find row number based on an
text: Excel sheets sometimes updated add additional rows. function find rows interest based "anchor cells" – cells known contents (e.g., column headers) known column. Using instead hard-coding row numbers can make automation less fragile addition rows.

title: Find row number based on an
code: row_finder(master_file, sheet, column, pattern, instance = 1, offset = 0)

title: Find row number based on an
text: master_file Character. Filepath Excel file interest sheet Character numeric. Sheet name index search column Character numeric. Column letter (e.g., "") number search pattern pattern Character. Regular expression pattern match specified column instance Numeric. match use multiple matches found? Defaults 1. offset Numeric. Number add returned row number. Useful pattern identifies title row want row (1) (-1). Defaults 0

title: Find row number based on an
text: Numeric. Row number pattern found, adjusted offset

title: Find row number based on an
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ row_finder("data.xlsx", "Sheet1", "A", "Total", instance = 1, offset = 1) row_finder("data.xlsx", 1, 3, "Summary", offset = -1) } # }

title: excelsior (development version)
text: row_finder(): finds row number based “anchor” cell known column pattern. as_numeric_smart(): .numeric(), correctly handles cases numbers commas , numbers ending %s. copy_columns(): copies specified sets columns start_row end_row one file another, highlighting cells copied cells changed values addition validate_*() input validation
